title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Introducing our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, the perfect addition to your holiday decorations! This set includes a 23.6-inch wreath and an 8.8-feet garland, adorned with snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches. 

Illuminate your home with the warm glow of 100 LED lights, creating a cozy and festive atmosphere both indoors and outdoors. The LED lights, powered by 3 AA batteries (not included), offer a timer function of 6 hours on and 18 hours off, providing convenience and energy efficiency.

Crafted from sturdy high-quality materials, our wreath and garland are built to last. They are hypoallergenic and feature fireproof pins, ensuring safety and peace of mind. With no assembly required, you can easily hang them up and enjoy the holiday spirit without any hassle.

Maintaining our wreath and garland is a breeze - no need for water, and they will never fade. They are suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, making them versatile for any space. Hang them on your wall, door, fireplace, or place them in your living room, bedroom, dining room, or windows, adding a touch of elegance and festive cheer.

To provide you with peace of mind, we offer a generous warranty period of 365 days. Our dedicated customer service is available 24 hours a day to assist you with any inquiries or concerns.

Make this holiday season extra special with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Order yours now and transform your home into a winter wonderland!
